---test---
NAME: TestGetStringPseudo
COMMENT: test GetString()

---data---
type: GetString
locale: en
component: about
key: about.message
source: message in code
expect: @@message in code@@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: en
component: about
key: about.message
expect: @@Your application description page.@@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: about
key: about.message
expect: #@Your application description page.#@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: about
key: about.message
source: Your application description page.
expect: #@Your application description page.#@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message
expect: @@Ihrer Bewerbungs Beschreibung Seite. add@@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message
source: message in code
expect: @@message in code@@

---data---
type: GetString
locale: de
component: aboutadd
key: about.message
source: Your application description page. add
expect: @@Ihrer Bewerbungs Beschreibung Seite. add@@
